body_html: My personal suggestion is to not use tf.flags and to just use argparse / your own solution. As far as I know, it was provided for convenience, but it's more of a maintenance burden for us than it's worth, and we might remove it. We don't want to be in the flags library business ;)
body_text: My personal suggestion is to not use tf.flags and to just use argparse / your own solution.  As far as I know, it was provided for convenience, but it's more of a maintenance burden for us than it's worth, and we might remove it.  We don't want to be in the flags library business ;)
body: My personal suggestion is to not use tf.flags and to just use argparse / your own solution.  As far as I know, it was provided for convenience, but it's more of a maintenance burden for us than it's worth, and we might remove it.  We don't want to be in the flags library business ;)
